info.description: RESTful API for managing products and orders in an e-commerce system with payment webhook integration
info.title: Go E-Commerce API

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token
Create a new user account. Public registration creates customer accounts. Creating admin accounts requires admin authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Admin authentication required for admin role

403.description: Forbidden - Only admins can create admin accounts

get.description: Get all categories with pagination and sorting
Get a paginated list of orders with optional filtering and sorting

parameters.description: Filter by payment status (unpaid, paid, failed)
parameters.name: payment_status

post.description: Create a new order with the provided products

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific order
Retrieves all payment webhook events for a specific order

put.description: Update the status of an existing order

post.description: Receives payment status updates from payment processor with HMAC signature verification and replay attack prevention

parameters.description: HMAC-SHA256 signature of the request body
parameters.name: X-Payment-Signature

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific product variant
get.summary: Get a product variant by ID

get.description: Get a paginated list of products with optional filtering and sorting

post.description: Create a new product with the provided information

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific product
Get all categories assigned to a product

post.description: Assign a category to a product (Admin only)

delete.description: Remove a category from a product (Admin only)

get.description: Get a paginated list of product variants for a specific product with sorting
get.summary: List all product variants for a product

post.description: Create a new product variant with the provided information. Requires admin privileges.

put.description: Update an existing product variant's information. Requires admin privileges.

delete.description: Delete a product variant by ID. Requires admin privileges.

price.description: Effective price (override or base product price)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
